Parameter.name: IKPFILTERMODE
Parameter.Description: As the app only shows spread, this filter mode will do all we need with less work than the classic $$$FILTERALLANDSORT

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Features" Method="GET" Call="GetFeatures" />
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sources" Method="GET" Call="GetSources" /> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sources/Set/:setId" Method="GET" Call="GetSourcesBySet"/> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sources/Set/:setId1/:setId2" Method="GET" Call="GetSourcesBySetOverlap"/>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sentences/Entity/:entity" Method="GET" Call="GetSentencesByEntity"/>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Entities" Method="GET" Call="GetEntitiesTop"/> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Entities/:string" Method="GET" Call="GetEntitiesSimilar"/>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sets/Info" Method="GET" Call="GetSetInfo"/> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sets/Save" Method="POST" Call="SaveSet"/> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sets/Delete" Method="POST" Call="DeleteSet"/> <Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sets/RemoveEntity" Method="POST" Call="RemoveEntityFromSet"/>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sets/Overlaps/:setId" Method="GET" Call="GetSetOverlap"/>
<Route Url="/Domain/:domain/Sentiment" Method="GET" Call="GetSentimental" /> </Routes>

Method.name: GetSources
Method.Description: Retrieves all sources (including full text and metadata) in the domain and prints them as JSON

Method.name: GetSentencesByEntity
Method.Description: Retrieves all sentences (including full text) in the domain containing <var>pEntity</var> and prints them as JSON

Method.name: GetSourcesBySet
Method.Description: Retrieves the list of sources in <var>pSetId</var> and prints them to JSON.

Method.name: GetSourcesBySetOverlap
Method.Description: Retrieves the list of sources part of both <var>pSetId1</var> and <var>pSetId2</var> and prints them to JSON.

Method.name: GetSourcesInternal
Method.Description: Utility method to print a list of sources to JSON

Method.name: GetHighlightedSource
Method.Description: Retrieves a highlighted summary of the text in source <var>pSourceId</var>, optionally filtered to the sentences containing <var>pFilterByEntity</var>. At most <var>pMaxSentences</var> will be returned. Any markup in <var>pHighlight</var> is appended with default highlighting of negations

Method.name: GetHighlightedSentence
GetEntitiesTop
Method.Description: Retrieves the top entities in the domain and prints them to JSON

Method.name: GetEntitiesSimilar
Method.Description: Retrieves the top entities similar to <var>pString</var> and prints them to JSON

Method.name: EntityResultToJSON
Method.Description: Utility method for converting an array of entities to JSON

Method.name: GetSetInfo
SaveSet
Method.Description:
Saves the posted set information to a SetDefintion, appending the supplied list of entities to any that might already exist for the set specified in the request. Accepts the following JSON (as HTTP POST content): 
{
		SetId: 123,
		Name: 'name',
		Entities: [ 'ent1', 'ent2' ]
}

Method.name: RemoveEntityFromSet
Method.Description:
Removes a single entity from a set. Accepts the following JSON (as HTTP POST content): 
{
		SetId: 123,
		Name: 'name',
		RemoveEntity: 'ent1'
}

Method.name: DeleteSet
GetSetOverlap
GetNotInSetFilter
Method.Description: Utility method to retrieve a <class>%iKnow.Filters.Filter</class> object representing all sources not part of any set.

Method.name: ErrorHandler
Method.Description: Simple error handler, converting a <class>%Status</class> object to a JSON representation.
Method.Implementation: if $$$ISERR(Stat) { set errorcode=$piece(##class(%SYSTEM.Status).GetErrorCodes(Stat),",") set errormessage=##class(%SYSTEM.Status).GetOneStatusText(Stat) set errobj=##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set errobj.ErrorNum=errorcode set errobj.ErrorMessage=errormessage Set %response.ContentType="application/json" Do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ObjectToJSON(errobj) set errobj="" } quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetSentimental
GetFeatures
